news.title: What will 'reset' deal mean for UK economic growth?
news.summary: The deal paves the way for more common ground with the EU, but only dismantles a fraction of the trade barriers erected post-Brexit.

news.title: Lineker to leave BBC sooner than planned after antisemitism row
news.summary: He will no longer present the corporation's future coverage of the FA Cup and World Cup as planned.

news.title: Gary Lineker could not keep quiet. In the end, it finished his BBC career
news.summary: His years as a BBC host end in circumstances nobody would have wanted, but some might have predicted.

news.title: Third man arrested over fires at homes linked to PM
news.summary: A 34-year-old man is arrested over alleged arson attacks on properties connected to Sir Keir Starmer.

news.title: Cancer touches us all, says Biden after outpouring of support
news.summary: The former US president has been diagnosed with an aggressive form of prostate cancer that has spread to his bones, his office says.
